commands.name: Fluid Implement
commands.description: Create and execute a task in one command (combines create-task + execute-task).

commands.name: Fluid Create Branch
commands.description: Create a new Git branch for the current work.

commands.name: Fluid Commit
commands.description: Create a Git commit with the staged changes.

commands.name: Fluid Create PR
commands.description: Open a pull request for the current branch.
